ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 42
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Amy! I love gauntlet.  I Want to get the Gauntlet Legends game that comes out on the 22 of September for the N64.  What s your favorite Gauntlet Character?
ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 43
Message-ID: <17248.43.119.959279670@...>
Date: Fri, 20 Aug 1999 12:40:31 EDT
From: Light4700@...
Subject: Re: Digest Number 42

Hi Amy!
    I love gauntlet.  I Want to get the Gauntlet Legends game that comes out 
on the 22 of September for the N64.  What's your favorite Gauntlet Character? 
 Mines the Wizard.  At the arcades, I'm a level 25 Conjurer.  What's your 
favorite Gladiator Character, mine is the Cleric because He can revive lost 
characters and raise skeletons and Ghosts and can drain experience points 
from enemies using the mystic mace ability?  If you would like some Gladiator 
stages you can download them here if you like.  E-mail me with those answers
